misc: Known for bomb drives despite his advanced age.
Finally made his first hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, after 20 years of trying.
biography: Harri, affectionately known as "the doctor" within golfing circles, brings a wealth of experience and a certain joie de vivre to the greens. Representing Hattula Golf, Harri is set to make his sixth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025.
Despite his advanced age, Harri remains a formidable competitor, renowned for his bomb drives that defy expectations. His participation adds a layer of seasoned strategy to the competition.

Off the course, Harri is celebrated for his affable nature and unwavering dedication to the sport. After two decades of persistent effort, Harri finally achieved his first hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, a testament to his enduring passion for golf. He has secured the coveted Hector Trophée twice in the past.
